name: Live Reporting System
description: A university platform for managing SGPs, internships, exams, and results. Features include Excel data import, automated NOC generation, project allocation, and approval workflows. Optimized APIs ensure efficient data handling and streamlined academic processes.
features: RESTful APIs for managing SGPs, internships, exams, and results
Excel-based bulk data import using batching and optimized inserts
Automated NOC generation using real-time database queries
Dynamic project ID generation with guide and team mapping logic
Approval workflow with conditional data persistence and reviewer comments
